name: Northern Cross
description: Northern Cross by Glen’s Plant Farm is a combination of two sativa-dominant hybrids built for potency and trichome production. With dense buds that smell of bright citrus and earth, this Chernobyl x Permafrost pairing is dreamy and uplifting while imbuing the body with relaxed contentment. Enjoy Northern Cross throughout the day for its calming physical attributes and mood elevation.
descriptionPlain: Northern Cross by Glen’s Plant Farm is a combination of two sativa-dominant hybrids built for potency and trichome production. With dense buds that smell of bright citrus and earth, this Chernobyl x Permafrost pairing is dreamy and uplifting while imbuing the body with relaxed contentment. Enjoy Northern Cross throughout the day for its calming physical attributes and mood elevation.

highlightedReviews.text:
So this strain is interesting, I tried it out of a suggestion. First it's cross, Chernobyl and Permafrost, the mix provides an incredible cerebral. Uplifting and inspiring thought and creativity; I see why this herb would be popular in the PNW. It is a go getter makes one prone to get something done. I would refrain from smoking this strain if you plan on just having a lazy day as anxiety sort of settles in the back of the mind, take this herb with a hike and some nature. 

On that note I'd be very interested in seeing a lab tested terp profile on this flower. As my search has turned up nothing. 

✌️ Medicate safely and appropriately friends.
